title: Blind man's bluff
creator_credit: Children's Film Foundation, Willis World Wide Films, Cyril Randell and Gerry O'Hara
brief_description: A young boy named Joe Hunter is kidnapped after his father wins 200,000 pounds in the lottery. His two young friends team up with Smithie, a blind man, and together they discover who kidnapped Joe, resulting in his rescue.
